original_title: Fascism on a Thread: The Strange Story of Nazisploitation Cinema
overview: Feature length documentary on the cult sub-genre featuring interviews with Dyanne ‘Ilsa’ Thorne, Malissa ‘Elsa’ Longo, filmmakers Sergio Garrone, Mariano Caiano, Rino Di Silvestro, Liliana Cavani, Bruno Mattei, and many more.
tagline: Everything you wanted to know about nazisploitation and maybe some stuff you didn't want to know...
title: Fascism on a Thread: The Strange Story of Nazisploitation Cinema
